kohoma unath mage kama wela wadi hariyak hadune ape aadayam thathwayatath hariyana widiyata thamayi.amma rata gehun ewana mudaluyi..thaththa kada welandamen wagema thawath kalayak korapu kad badu welandamen..(ee kiwwe oya eka eka jathi..kilo ganata genath..eewa punchi pakat walata ahurala..eewa kad bod eheka ellala udin podi lebalayak ehema gahillak..oya danuth kadawala thiyenne karabu nati..karandamungu..ethakota nil pakat..wage anna eehema welandamak..)thamayi gedara aarthike hadune..eeta amatharawa thaththa koyi kaleth wage bulath kotuwak dekak kola...gammiris tikak..welapu kaju tikak..wikuna ganna mattamata thibuna..eeta amatharawa thiyena hatiyakata elawalu paththiyak..manynyokka tikak kehel gas deka thunak ehemath thibuna hinda eewayinuth sulu aadayamak labuna..
